description: This file defines navigation routes and a composable NavHost for an Android application using Jetpack Compose and Navigation. It includes route constants, a function to generate detail routes, and a composable function that sets up navigation destinations for Home, Details, Search, and Settings screens.

classes.name: Routes
classes.description: Object containing route constants and a helper method to generate details routes.

methods.name: detailsFor
methods.description: Constructs a details route string with a specific id parameter.

methods.name: AppNavHost
methods.description: Composable function that sets up the navigation graph with routes for Home, Details, Search, and Settings screens.
